name: gymcore
description: Sistema de gestiÃ³n integral para gimnasios con arquitectura de microservicios

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "pnpm dev:gateway" "pnpm dev:gyms"  "pnpm dev:payments" "pnpm dev:notifications" "pnpm dev:auth"
scripts.dev:gateway: infisical run --path=/api-gateway -- pnpm --filter api-gateway run start:dev
scripts.dev:auth: infisical run --path=/auth-service -- pnpm --filter auth-service run start:dev
scripts.dev:gyms: infisical run --path=/gym-management-service -- pnpm --filter gym-management-service run start:dev
scripts.dev:payments: infisical run --path=/payment-service -- pnpm --filter payment-service run start:dev
scripts.dev:notifications: infisical run --path=/notification-service -- pnpm --filter notification-service run start:dev
scripts.dev:frontend: infisical run --path=/web-dashboard -- pnpm --filter web-dashboard run dev
scripts.db:generate:auth: infisical run --path=/auth-service -- pnpm exec prisma generate --schema=./backend/apps/auth-service/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:generate:gym: infisical run --path=/gym-management-service -- pnpm exec prisma generate --schema=./backend/apps/gym-management-service/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:generate:inventory: infisical run --path=/inventory-service -- pnpm exec prisma generate --schema=./backend/apps/inventory-service/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:generate:payment: infisical run --path=/payment-service -- pnpm exec prisma generate --schema=./backend/apps/payment-service/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:migrate:auth: infisical run --path=/auth-service -- pnpm exec prisma migrate dev --schema=./backend/apps/auth-service/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:migrate:gym: infisical run --path=/gym-management-service -- pnpm exec prisma migrate dev --schema=./backend/apps/gym-management-service/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:migrate:inventory: infisical run --path=/inventory-service -- pnpm exec prisma migrate dev --schema=./backend/apps/inventory-service/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:migrate:payment: infisical run --path=/payment-service -- pnpm exec prisma migrate dev --schema=./backend/apps/payment-service/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:migrate:all: pnpm db:migrate:auth && pnpm db:migrate:gym && pnpm db:migrate:inventory && pnpm db:migrate:payment
scripts.db:push:auth: infisical run --path=/auth-service -- pnpm exec prisma db push --schema=./backend/apps/auth-service/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:push:gym: infisical run --path=/gym-management-service -- pnpm exec prisma db push --schema=./backend/apps/gym-management-service/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:push:inventory: infisical run --path=/inventory-service -- pnpm exec prisma db push --schema=./backend/apps/inventory-service/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:push:payment: infisical run --path=/payment-service -- pnpm exec prisma db push --schema=./backend/apps/payment-service/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:reset:auth: infisical run --path=/auth-service -- pnpm exec prisma migrate reset --schema=./backend/apps/auth-service/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:reset:gym: infisical run --path=/gym-management-service -- pnpm exec prisma migrate reset --schema=./backend/apps/gym-management-service/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:reset:inventory: infisical run --path=/inventory-service -- pnpm exec prisma migrate reset --schema=./backend/apps/inventory-service/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:reset:payment: infisical run --path=/payment-service -- pnpm exec prisma migrate reset --schema=./backend/apps/payment-service/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.test:auth: infisical run --path=/auth-service -- pnpm --filter auth-service run test
scripts.test:gyms: infisical run --path=/gym-management-service -- pnpm --filter gym-management-service run test
scripts.test:payments: infisical run --path=/payment-service -- pnpm --filter payment-service run test
scripts.test:gateway: infisical run --path=/api-gateway -- pnpm --filter api-gateway run test
scripts.clean:deps: pnpm -r exec rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf node_modules

author: Tu Nombre
